mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msf_operation_task(task_id, status, task_type, error_msg, namespace_id, app_template_id, create_time) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{status}, #{taskType}, #{errorMsg}, #{namespaceId}, #{appTemplateId}, #{createTime});
mapper.select: SELECT id, task_id, status, task_type, error_msg, namespace_id, app_template_id, create_time, update_time FROM msf_operation_task WHERE task_id=#{taskId}

SELECT id, task_id, status, task_type, error_msg, namespace_id, app_template_id, create_time, update_time FROM msf_operation_task WHERE namespace_id=#{namespaceId} AND task_type=#{taskType} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, task_id, status, task_type, error_msg, namespace_id, app_template_id, create_time, update_time FROM msf_operation_task WHERE namespace_id=#{namespaceId}
SELECT id, task_id, status, task_type, error_msg, namespace_id, app_template_id, create_time, update_time FROM msf_operation_task WHERE namespace_id=#{namespaceId} and status = #{status}
